video_prompt:
**Prompt:**

A stark, digital interface undergoes a sudden shift, revealing a "403 Forbidden" error. Text appears then changes, clarifying "Registration required to upload adult content," implying a dynamic policy enforcement. The background remains minimal, highlighting the evolving message and its impact on user interaction.
image_prompt: Dark grey/black square graphic, white sans-serif text. Top: "FREE IMAGE HOST". Center, large: "403". Below: "Registration is required to upload adult content." Error message style.
refined_video_prompt: Digital interface elements dynamically shift and reconfigure. A "403 Forbidden" error message quickly materializes, then visibly transforms. The text actively rewrites itself, clarifying "Registration required to upload adult content." The animated transformation underscores a live, responsive policy update.
